remarks: Commutative/associative law for Abelian monoids.  (Contributed by Stefan O'Rear, 5-Sep-2015.)  (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 21-Apr-2016.)
statement:
ablcom.b $e |- B = ( Base ` G ) $.
ablcom.p $e |- .+ = ( +g ` G ) $.
cmn12 $p |- ( ( G e. CMnd /\ ( X e. B /\ Y e. B /\ Z e. B ) ) -> ( X .+ ( Y .+ Z ) ) = ( Y .+ ( X .+ Z ) ) ) $.
